sourceMeaningMnemonic: You want some <radical>flowers</radical> to put on the <radical>canopy</radical> above your <radical>helicopter</radical> to keep the <radical>bird</radical>s away, so you ask people what they would <kanji>recommend</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You've bought flowers before, but you really don't know which ones would work best to stop birds from landing on the canopy and pooping on your helicopter.
readingMnemonic: You ask for a <kanji>recommend</kanji>ation from the <reading>cen</reading>taur (<ja>せん</ja>) that owns the local flower shop. Now he's walking around your helicopter canopy and staring at the birds, nodding.
readingInfo: I hope the centaur recommends a cheap flower... but with your luck flowers that keep birds away will cost a fortune.
